channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration sues Chicago in latest crackdown on `sanctuary’ cities
item.description: The Trump administration is suing Chicago over what are known as sanctuary laws. The administration claims the nation’s third-largest city “thwarts” federal efforts to enforce immigration laws.

item.title: San Jose State and Penn face inquiries in Trump crackdown on transgender athletes
Judge temporarily blocks Trump plan offering incentives for federal workers to resign
